6// mtl_constnats.h:
7// Declares numerical and string constants used in Metal
8//
9
10#ifndef LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_MTL_CONSTANTS_H
11#define LIBANGLE_RENDERER_METAL_MTL_CONSTANTS_H
12#include "libANGLE/Constants.h"
13#include "libANGLE/Version.h"
14#include "libANGLE/angletypes.h"
15
16namespace rx
17{
18namespace mtl
19{
20
21// NOTE(hqle): support variable max number of vertex attributes
22constexpr uint32_t kMaxVertexAttribs = gl::MAX_VERTEX_ATTRIBS;
23// NOTE(hqle): support variable max number of render targets
24constexpr uint32_t kMaxRenderTargets = 4;
25
26constexpr uint32_t kMaxShaderUBOs = 12;
27constexpr uint32_t kMaxUBOSize = 16384;
28
29constexpr uint32_t kMaxShaderXFBs = gl::IMPLEMENTATION_MAX_TRANSFORM_FEEDBACK_SEPARATE_ATTRIBS;
30
31// The max size of a buffer that will be allocated in shared memory.
32// NOTE(hqle): This is just a hint. There is no official document on what is the max allowed size
33// for shared memory.
34constexpr size_t kSharedMemBufferMaxBufSizeHint = 128 * 1024;
35
36constexpr size_t kDefaultAttributeSize = 4 * sizeof(float);
37
38// Metal limits
39constexpr uint32_t kMaxShaderBuffers = 31;
40constexpr uint32_t kMaxShaderSamplers = 16;
41constexpr size_t kInlineConstDataMaxSize = 4 * 1024;
42constexpr size_t kDefaultUniformsMaxSize = kInlineConstDataMaxSize;
43constexpr uint32_t kMaxViewports = 1;
44
45constexpr uint32_t kVertexAttribBufferStrideAlignment = 4;
46// Alignment requirement for offset passed to setVertex|FragmentBuffer
47#if TARGET_OS_OSX || TARGET_OS_MACCATALYST
48constexpr uint32_t kUniformBufferSettingOffsetMinAlignment = 256;
49#else
50constexpr uint32_t kUniformBufferSettingOffsetMinAlignment = 4;
51#endif
52constexpr uint32_t kIndexBufferOffsetAlignment = 4;
53constexpr uint32_t kArgumentBufferOffsetAlignment = kUniformBufferSettingOffsetMinAlignment;
54constexpr uint32_t kTextureToBufferBlittingAlignment = 256;
55
56// Font end binding limits
57constexpr uint32_t kMaxGLSamplerBindings = 2 * kMaxShaderSamplers;
58constexpr uint32_t kMaxGLUBOBindings = 2 * kMaxShaderUBOs;
59
60// Binding index start for vertex data buffers:
61constexpr uint32_t kVboBindingIndexStart = 0;
62
63// Binding index for default attribute buffer:
64constexpr uint32_t kDefaultAttribsBindingIndex = kVboBindingIndexStart + kMaxVertexAttribs;
65// Binding index for driver uniforms:
66constexpr uint32_t kDriverUniformsBindingIndex = kDefaultAttribsBindingIndex + 1;
67// Binding index for default uniforms:
68constexpr uint32_t kDefaultUniformsBindingIndex = kDefaultAttribsBindingIndex + 3;
69// Binding index for Transform Feedback Buffers (4)
70constexpr uint32_t kTransformFeedbackBindingIndex = kDefaultUniformsBindingIndex + 1;
71// Binding index for shadow samplers' compare modes
72constexpr uint32_t kShadowSamplerCompareModesBindingIndex = kTransformFeedbackBindingIndex + 4;
73// Binding index for UBO's argument buffer
74constexpr uint32_t kUBOArgumentBufferBindingIndex = kShadowSamplerCompareModesBindingIndex + 1;
75
76constexpr uint32_t kStencilMaskAll = 0xff; // Only 8 bit stencil is supported
77
78static const char * kUnassignedAttributeString = " __unassigned_attribute__";
79
80
81constexpr float kEmulatedAlphaValue = 1.0f;
82
83constexpr uint32_t kOcclusionQueryResultSize = sizeof(uint64_t);
84
85
86
87} // namespace mtl
88} // namespace rx
89#endif
90
